definition.name: AlertDialog
definition.purpose: Provides a modal dialog for critical user confirmations or alerts.
definition.description: A reusable alert dialog component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Root. It is used to display modal dialogs that require user attention and confirmation, such as destructive actions or important warnings.

initial.data: Dialog is closed and not visible.

when.description: The user or system opens the dialog.

effects: Dialog is displayed as a modal overlay

when.description: The user or system closes the dialog.

definition.visualLayout: Modal overlay centered on the screen with content, header, description, and action/footer sections.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialog primitives. Accepts all props of AlertDialogPrimitive.Root.

definition.name: AlertDialogTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element to open the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Trigger. Used to render a button or element that, when interacted with, opens the alert dialog.

when.description: User interacts with the trigger (e.g., clicks a button).

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Trigger. Accepts all props of the primitive.

definition.name: AlertDialogPortal
definition.purpose: Renders the alert dialog in a React portal.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Portal. Ensures the dialog is rendered outside the normal DOM hierarchy, typically at the end of the document body.

initial.data: Portal is not rendered until dialog is open.

effects: Dialog content is rendered in a portal

definition.visualLayout: No visible layout; affects DOM structure.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Portal. Accepts all props of the primitive.

definition.name: AlertDialogOverlay
definition.purpose: Displays a semi-transparent overlay behind the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable overlay component that dims the background and prevents interaction with the rest of the UI while the alert dialog is open. Wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Overlay and applies custom styles.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the overlay.

effects: Background is dimmed and interaction is blocked

definition.visualLayout: Fixed, full-screen overlay with fade/animation effects.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Overlay. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: AlertDialogContent
definition.purpose: Displays the main content of the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Content and includes the overlay and portal. It displays the dialog's content, such as title, description, and actions, centered in the viewport.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content container.

initial.data: Content is not rendered until dialog is open.

definition.visualLayout: Centered modal with padding, border, and shadow.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps AlertDialogPortal, AlertDialogOverlay, and AlertDialogPrimitive.Content. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: AlertDialogHeader
definition.purpose: Displays the header section of the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component for the header section of the alert dialog, typically containing the title and optional description. Renders a styled div.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the header.

initial.data: Header is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.implementationNotes: Renders a div with merged className using cn utility.

definition.name: AlertDialogFooter
definition.purpose: Displays the footer section of the alert dialog, typically for action buttons.
definition.description: A reusable component for the footer section of the alert dialog, usually containing action and cancel buttons. Renders a styled div.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the footer.

initial.data: Footer is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.visualLayout: Flex row/column, gap, alignment for actions.
definition.implementationNotes: Renders a div with merged className using cn utility.

definition.name: AlertDialogTitle
definition.purpose: Displays the title of the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Title. Used to display the main heading of the alert dialog.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the title.

initial.data: Title is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Title. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: AlertDialogDescription
definition.purpose: Displays a description or additional information in the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Description. Used to provide additional context or information in the alert dialog.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the description.

initial.data: Description is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Description. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: AlertDialogAction
definition.purpose: Renders a primary action button for the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Action and applies button styles. Used for the main confirmation action in the dialog.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the action button.

initial.data: Action button is rendered in the dialog footer.

effects: Dialog is closed and action is confirmed

definition.visualLayout: Styled button in the dialog footer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Action. Uses buttonVariants and cn utility for styling.

definition.name: AlertDialogCancel
definition.purpose: Renders a cancel button for the alert dialog.
definition.description: A reusable component that wraps Radix UI's AlertDialogPrimitive.Cancel and applies outline button styles. Used for the cancel/dismiss action in the dialog.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the cancel button.

initial.data: Cancel button is rendered in the dialog footer.

effects: Dialog is closed and action is cancelled

definition.visualLayout: Styled outline button in the dialog footer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI AlertDialogPrimitive.Cancel. Uses buttonVariants with outline and cn utility for styling.
